Package com.tsgrp.migration.transformation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTransformer
    User: Steel.
    AppendTransformer
    Transformer to append each of the arguments together
    AttributeSwitchTransformer
    The AttributeSwitchTransformer is a dynamic switch transformer used in the config mapping section of OpenMigrate.
    CharsFromBeginningTransformer
    Transformer to return first N number of characters from the given attribute.
    CharsFromEndTransformer
    Transformer to return N number of characters from the given attribute, either from the left or right.
    CombinedAttributesTransformer
    Transformer to append each of the arguments together
    DateFormatTransformer
    Transformer to retrieve a string version of a date
    DateYearAdderTransformer
    Transformer to retrieve a string version of a date
    FilePathParserCommaSeparateTransformer
    Transformer to pull out folder names based on index from a filepath.
    FilePathParserTransformer
    Transformer to pull out folder names based on index from a filepath.
    FilePathSeparatorTransformer
    Transformer to pull out ALL folder names based on a filepath.
    IfNullSwitchTransformer
    Transformer to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; if missing, null or blank use get($2); otherwise the value of node.get($1).
    IfNullTransformer
    Transformer to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; if missing, null or blank use $2; otherwise the value of node.get($1).
    IfWithEvalRepeatingTransformer
    IfWithArrayEval Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") allows for a general IF checker and allows the ability to do checks against migration node attributes which return an array of values and static values.
    IfWithEvalTransformer
    IfWithEval Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") allows for a general IF checker and allows the ability to do checks against migration node attributes and static values.
    IncrementTransformer
    Converts the value of an attribute to an integer and increments the value by 1.
    InjectAssetNumberTransformer
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    InsertRepeatingValuesTransformer
    Adds values from the attribute $1 that match the regular expression $2.
    LeftPadTransformer
    Transformer to left pad a String to have $2 number of characters total using the padding character $3.
    MatchAndSwitchTransformer
    Delimit segments by tildes, and within each segment by semicolons: MatchAndSwitchTransformer~src_attr;regex;target value~~src_attr;else;else value - Commas must be escaped with a single backslash.
    MultiSourceSwitchTransformer
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    NormalizeFileNameTransformer
    Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; and replace all invalid filename characters with character(s) specified by $3.
    QumasNameTransformer
    The QumasNameTransformer is a transformer used to change user names from the form "Last, First" to "First Last".
    RemoveCharsTransformer
    Transformer to remove all instances of the specified character from the specified attribute of the MigrationNode.
    RemoveDuplicateRepeatingValuesTransformer
    Remove duplicate values from the repeating attribute $1.
    RemoveRepeatingValuesTransformer
    Remove values from the attribute $1 that match the regular expression $2.
    RemoveTrailingWhitespaceTransformer
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    RepeatingAttributeExploderTransformer  
    ReplaceCharsTransformer
    Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; replace all characters specified by $2 with characters specified by $3, in order (see StringUtils.replaceChars(String, String, String)).
    ReplaceFirstTransformer
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    ReplaceTransformer
    Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; replace all instances of the string specified by $2 with $3, in order (see StringUtils.replace(String, String, String)).
    RightPadTransformer
    Transformer to right pad a String to have $2 number of characters total using the padding character $3.
    StaticSequenceTransformer
    Transformer to simply replace its token with a numeric sequence, obtained atomically.
    SubstringAfterFirstAttrValueTransformer
    Transformer to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; if missing, null or blank use $2; otherwise the value of node.get($1).
    SubstringAfterFirstTransformer
    Transformer to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; if missing, null or blank use $2; otherwise the value of node.get($1).
    SubstringAfterLastTransformer
    Transformer to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; if missing, null or blank use $2; otherwise the value of node.get($1).
    SubstringBeforeFirstTransformer
    Transformer to investigate the value of the Node attribute $1; if missing, null or blank use $2; otherwise the value of node.get($1).
    SubstringBeforeLastTransformer
    Transformer used to to update the value of the Node attribute $1 to be the substring before the last instance of $2 within the value currently stored for attribute $1.
    SubstringStartEndTransformer
    Transformer used to substring
    SwitchMatchAndEvalTransformer
    Switch-style transformer, matching a series of expressions $1 (evaluated against the current node using the syntax @[attrName] for attribute value substitution) against regular expressions $2; the transformer returns the first matching value $3 (also evaluated against the current node); no match -> empty string.
    SwitchTransformer
    The SwitchTransformer is a dynamic switch transformer used in the config mapping section of OpenMigrate.
    ToLowercaseTransformer
    ToLowercase Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") allows values to be converted to lowercase values
    ToUppercaseTransformer
    ToUppercase Transformer (arguments delimited by "~") allows values to be converted to UPPERCASE values
    TransformerFactory
    Factory class to retrieve transformers from the spring framework.
    TrimTransformer
    Transformer to trim leading and trailing whitespace
    VersionNumberTransformer
    Version Number Transformer converts the Documentum repeating version label field to a non-repeating field that contains only the numeric version.
    ZeroPadTransformer
    Transformer makes sure that the attribute length is always the length that is passed in as an argument If the attribute values is longer than the length specified, then it will truncate the string to ensure that it is the correct length If the attribute value is shorter than the length specified.
